#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
The following diagram illustrates the main classes of the library that can be executed from the command line. A few steps allow you to convert your data, link it with external data such as geonames, dbpedia and generate reports and maps. If you just want (customized) reports from your own data, you will only need the commands `gedsem.Convert` and `semweb.Select`.
